title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed via a simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter that plugs Ollama models into chains, agents, retrieval pipelines.

title: llama-index-llms-ollama
summary: LlamaIndex LLM integration for Ollama; run local models in query & indexing pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama models; no API keys needed.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich-terminal CLI client for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting, streaming.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses Ollama models for inline suggestions & chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU & GPU inference.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async APIs, Spring Boot starters available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama models.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal Next.js chatbot template powered by Ollama; one-click deploy to Vercel.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models in semantic search & QA pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and Q&A with Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve deployment recipe for scaling Ollama models across GPUs & nodes.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API; tokio & async support.
